sense.name: enclosed partition of a larger space or area
sense.examples: The ship's aft cargo compartment was taking on water. There is some ice cream in the freezer compartment. I got a first-class compartment on the train to Vienna.

sense.name: an abstract constraint separating components of a classification system
sense.commentary: COMPARTMENT[+entity][+abstract][+separator][+component][+system][+classification] Note: a figurative extension of Sense 1
sense.examples: They felt religion and politics should be kept in separate compartments. Mary is good at keeping her professional and personal life in different compartments.
